mapper.update: insert into hub_config(tenant_id, config_name, config_key, config_value, value_type, value_parser, is_default, remark, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) select #{tenantId}, config_name, config_key, config_value, value_type, value_parser, is_default, remark, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from hub_config where tenant_id = '#' on conflict(tenant_id, config_key) do update set config_name = excluded.config_name, config_value = excluded.config_value, value_type = excluded.value_type, value_parser = excluded.value_parser, is_default = excluded.is_default, remark = excluded.remark, create_by = excluded.create_by, create_time = excluded.create_time, update_by = excluded.update_by, update_time = excluded.update_time
